Factory Complex.text: Basic construction facility for our planets, increasing base production by 5% each active construction worker.

Farm Complex.text: Basic agriculture facility, increasing the base agriculture output of our planets by 5% each active farmer.

Research Center.text: Assiting our researchers anaylizing the ecological as well as the environmental values of our colonies, providing 4 research points per turn.

Marine Barracks.text:
Defending the colonies is an important task, our well trained marines help to do so.

Training one unit each 5 turns.

Missile Base.text: The missle base helps protecting the space around our planets. Providing 300 units space of our very best missiles; aiding our fleets.
